column1: Monthly Tourist Arrivals Report â€“ August  2023
In comparison to the same period in 2022, Sri Lanka's primary sources of international
tourists from January to August 2023 included India, the Russian Federation, the United
Kingdom, Germany, and France. Notably, there  was an increase in tourist arrivals  from
countries like Russia, India, the Maldives, and the United States during this period, which
contributed to the overall growth in tourist arrivals in Sri Lanka for the first eight months
